source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.fps_number IS NULL
        THEN T3.LegacyRightsOfWayID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                         AS LegacyRightsOfWayID,
    T1.record_status                            AS RecordStatus,
    T1.group                                    AS RecordGroup,
    T1.jurisdiction                             AS Jurisdiction,
    T1.fps_number                               AS FPSNumber,
    T1.fps_1                                    AS FPS1,
    T1.fps_2                                    AS FPS2,
    T1.fps_3                                    AS FPS3,
    T1.fps_4                                    AS FPS4,
    T1.lead_fps_number                          AS LeadFPSNumber,
    T1.migration                                AS Migration,
    T1.act                                      AS Act,
    T1.section                                  AS Section,
    T1.dataease_oma                             AS DataEaseOMA,
    T1.order_making_authority                   AS OrderMakingAuthority,
    T1.title_of_order                           AS TitleOfOrder,
    T1.oma_reference                            AS OMAReference,
    T1.oma_contact                              AS OMAContact,
    T1.oma_telephone                            AS OMATelephone,
    T1.oma_form_of_address                      AS OMAFormOfAddress,
    T1.dataease_objectors                       AS DataEaseObjectors,
    T1.number_of_objectors                      AS NumberOfObjectors,
    T1.concurrent_orders                        AS ConcurrentObjectors,
    T1.receipt_of_orders                        AS ReceiptOfOrders,
    T1.documentation_complete                   AS DocumentationComplete,
    T1.allocation_level                         AS AllocationLevel,
    T1.fee_rate                                 AS FeeRate,
    T1.date_order_validated                     AS DateOrderValidated,
    T1.order_rejected_or_returned               AS OrderRejectedOrReturned,
    T1.date_orders_withdrawn                    AS DateOrdersWithdrawn,
    T1.date_of_recovery_by_sos                  AS DateOfRecoveryBySOS,
    T1.date_procedure_confirmed                 AS DateProcedureConfirmed,
    T1.procedure                                AS Procedure,
    T1.date_inquiry_requested                   AS DateInquiryRequested,
    T1.local_inquiry_date                       AS LocalInquiryDate,
    T1.estimated_duration                       AS EstimatedDuration,
    T1.inquiry_venue                            AS InquiryVenue,
    T1.sent_for_allocation                      AS SentForAllocation,
    T1.inspectors_name                          AS InspectorsName,
    T1.inquiry_observed_by                      AS InquiryObservedBy,
    T1.inquirysv_cancelled                      AS InquirySVCancelled,
    T1.asv_usv                                  AS ASVUSV,
    T1.number_of_claims                         AS NumberOfClaims,
    T1._committed                               AS GBPCommitted,
    T1.committed_left                           AS CommittedLeft,
    T1.actual_duration                          AS ActualDuration,
    T1.sitting_days_claimed                     AS SittingDaysClaimed,
    T1.preparation_time                         AS PreparationTime,
    T1.reporting_time                           AS ReportingTime,
    T1.cost_of_claims                           AS CostOfClaims,
    T1.date_file_to_inspector                   AS DateFileToInspector,
    T1.receipt_of_decisionreport                AS ReceiptOfDecisionReport,
    T1.date_sent_to_reader                      AS DateSentToReader,
    T1.readers_name                             AS ReadersName,
    T1.date_returned_from_reader                AS DateReturnedFromReader,
    T1.date_decisionreport_despatched           AS DateDecisionReportDespatched,
    T1.decision_recommendation                  AS DecisionRecommendation,
    T1.date_publication_procedure_completed     AS DatePublicationProcedureCompleted,
    T1.date_file_to_pa                          AS DateFileToPA,
    T1.associated_file_1                        AS AssociatedFile1,
    T1.associated_file_2                        AS AssociatedFile2,
    T1.associated_file_3                        AS AssociatedFile3,
    T1.associated_file_4                        AS AssociatedFile4,
    T1.associated_file_5                        AS AssociatedFile5,
    T1.associated_file_6                        AS AssociatedFile6,
    T1.associated_file_7                        AS AssociatedFile7,
    T1.associated_file_8                        AS AssociatedFile8,
    T1.associated_file_9                        AS AssociatedFile9,
    T1.date_costs_report_despatched             AS DateCostsReportDespatched,
    T1.date_costs_order_originated              AS DateCostsOrderOriginated,
    T1.notes                                    AS Notes,
    T1.oma_stance                               AS OMAStance,
    T1.last_sitting_day                         AS LastSittingDay,
    T1.recharged_to_defra                       AS RechargedToDefra,
    T1.name_of_applicant                        AS NameOfApplicant,
    T1.decision_clear_for_despatch              AS DecisionClearForDespatch,
    T1.pdac_etl_date                            AS PDACETLDate,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)              AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.record_status,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.group,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.jurisdiction,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.jurisdiction,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.fps_number,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lead_fps_number,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.migration,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.act,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dataease_oma,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.order_making_authority,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.title_of_order,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.oma_reference,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.oma_contact,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.oma_telephone,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.oma_form_of_address,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dataease_objectors,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.number_of_objectors,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.concurrent_orders,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.receipt_of_orders,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.documentation_complete,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.allocation_level,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.fee_rate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_order_validated,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.order_rejected_or_returned,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_orders_withdrawn,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_of_recovery_by_sos,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_procedure_confirmed,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_inquiry_requested,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.local_inquiry_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.estimated_duration,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.inquiry_venue,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sent_for_allocation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.inspectors_name,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.inquiry_observed_by,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.inquirysv_cancelled,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.asv_usv,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.number_of_claims,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1._committed,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.committed_left,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.actual_duration,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sitting_days_claimed,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.preparation_time,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.reporting_time,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.cost_of_claims,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_file_to_inspector,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.receipt_of_decisionreport,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_sent_to_reader,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.readers_name,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_returned_from_reader,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_decisionreport_despatched,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.decision_recommendation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_publication_procedure_completed,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_file_to_pa,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.associated_file_1,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.associated_file_2,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.associated_file_3,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.associated_file_4,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.associated_file_5,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.associated_file_6,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.associated_file_7,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.associated_file_8,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.associated_file_9,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_costs_report_despatched,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date_costs_order_originated,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.notes,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.oma_stance,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.recharged_to_defra,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.name_of_applicant,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.decision_clear_for_despatch,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.pdac_etl_date,'.')
            ))                                  AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                                         AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                                 AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_hzn_right_of_way T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim T3 ON T1.fps_number = T3.FPSNumber AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.fps_number = T3.FPSNumber AND 
            md5(concat(
                IFNULL(T1.record_status,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.group,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.jurisdiction,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.jurisdiction,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.fps_number,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lead_fps_number,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.migration,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.act,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.dataease_oma,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.order_making_authority,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.title_of_order,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.oma_reference,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.oma_contact,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.oma_telephone,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.oma_form_of_address,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.dataease_objectors,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.number_of_objectors,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.concurrent_orders,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.receipt_of_orders,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.documentation_complete,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.allocation_level,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.fee_rate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_order_validated,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.order_rejected_or_returned,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_orders_withdrawn,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_of_recovery_by_sos,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_procedure_confirmed,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_inquiry_requested,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.local_inquiry_date,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.estimated_duration,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.inquiry_venue,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sent_for_allocation,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.inspectors_name,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.inquiry_observed_by,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.inquirysv_cancelled,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.asv_usv,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.number_of_claims,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1._committed,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.committed_left,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.actual_duration,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sitting_days_claimed,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.preparation_time,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.reporting_time,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.cost_of_claims,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_file_to_inspector,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.receipt_of_decisionreport,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_sent_to_reader,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.readers_name,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_returned_from_reader,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_decisionreport_despatched,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.decision_recommendation,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_publication_procedure_completed,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_file_to_pa,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.associated_file_1,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.associated_file_2,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.associated_file_3,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.associated_file_4,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.associated_file_5,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.associated_file_6,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.associated_file_7,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.associated_file_8,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.associated_file_9,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_costs_report_despatched,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date_costs_order_originated,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.notes,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.oma_stance,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.recharged_to_defra,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.name_of_applicant,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.decision_clear_for_despatch,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.pdac_etl_date,'.')
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same record, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.FPSNumber IS NULL -- new record
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y')
    AND T1.fps_number IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_hzn_right_of_way)
;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
Select 
    LegacyRightsOfWayID,
    RecordStatus,
    RecordGroup,
    Jurisdiction,
    FPSNumber,
    FPS1,
    FPS2,
    FPS3,
    FPS4,
    LeadFPSNumber,
    Migration,
    Act,
    Section,
    DataEaseOMA,
    OrderMakingAuthority,
    TitleOfOrder,
    OMAReference,
    OMAContact,
    OMATelephone,
    OMAFormOfAddress,
    DataEaseObjectors,
    NumberOfObjectors,
    ConcurrentObjectors,
    ReceiptOfOrders,
    DocumentationComplete,
    AllocationLevel,
    FeeRate,
    DateOrderValidated,
    OrderRejectedOrReturned,
    DateOrdersWithdrawn,
    DateOfRecoveryBySOS,
    DateProcedureConfirmed,
    Procedure,
    DateInquiryRequested,
    LocalInquiryDate,
    EstimatedDuration,
    InquiryVenue,
    SentForAllocation,
    InspectorsName,
    InquiryObservedBy,
    InquirySVCancelled,
    ASVUSV,
    NumberOfClaims,
    GBPCommitted,
    CommittedLeft,
    ActualDuration,
    SittingDaysClaimed,
    PreparationTime,
    ReportingTime,
    CostOfClaims,
    DateFileToInspector,
    ReceiptOfDecisionReport,
    DateSentToReader,
    ReadersName,
    DateReturnedFromReader,
    DateDecisionReportDespatched,
    DecisionRecommendation,
    DatePublicationProcedureCompleted,
    DateFileToPA,
    AssociatedFile1,
    AssociatedFile2,
    AssociatedFile3,
    AssociatedFile4,
    AssociatedFile5,
    AssociatedFile6,
    AssociatedFile7,
    AssociatedFile8,
    AssociatedFile9,
    DateCostsReportDespatched,
    DateCostsOrderOriginated,
    Notes,
    OMAStance,
    LastSittingDay,
    RechargedToDefra,
    NameOfApplicant,
    DecisionClearForDespatch,
    PDACETLDate,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    LegacyRightsOfWayID,
    RecordStatus,
    RecordGroup,
    Jurisdiction,
    FPSNumber,
    FPS1,
    FPS2,
    FPS3,
    FPS4,
    LeadFPSNumber,
    Migration,
    Act,
    Section,
    DataEaseOMA,
    OrderMakingAuthority,
    TitleOfOrder,
    OMAReference,
    OMAContact,
    OMATelephone,
    OMAFormOfAddress,
    DataEaseObjectors,
    NumberOfObjectors,
    ConcurrentObjectors,
    ReceiptOfOrders,
    DocumentationComplete,
    AllocationLevel,
    FeeRate,
    DateOrderValidated,
    OrderRejectedOrReturned,
    DateOrdersWithdrawn,
    DateOfRecoveryBySOS,
    DateProcedureConfirmed,
    Procedure,
    DateInquiryRequested,
    LocalInquiryDate,
    EstimatedDuration,
    InquiryVenue,
    SentForAllocation,
    InspectorsName,
    InquiryObservedBy,
    InquirySVCancelled,
    ASVUSV,
    NumberOfClaims,
    GBPCommitted,
    CommittedLeft,
    ActualDuration,
    SittingDaysClaimed,
    PreparationTime,
    ReportingTime,
    CostOfClaims,
    DateFileToInspector,
    ReceiptOfDecisionReport,
    DateSentToReader,
    ReadersName,
    DateReturnedFromReader,
    DateDecisionReportDespatched,
    DecisionRecommendation,
    DatePublicationProcedureCompleted,
    DateFileToPA,
    AssociatedFile1,
    AssociatedFile2,
    AssociatedFile3,
    AssociatedFile4,
    AssociatedFile5,
    AssociatedFile6,
    AssociatedFile7,
    AssociatedFile8,
    AssociatedFile9,
    DateCostsReportDespatched,
    DateCostsOrderOriginated,
    Notes,
    OMAStance,
    LastSittingDay,
    RechargedToDefra,
    NameOfApplicant,
    DecisionClearForDespatch,
    PDACETLDate,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim
WHERE FPSNumber IN (SELECT FPSNumber FROM casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_new WHERE LegacyRightsOfWayID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    LegacyRightsOfWayID,
    RecordStatus,
    RecordGroup,
    Jurisdiction,
    FPSNumber,
    FPS1,
    FPS2,
    FPS3,
    FPS4,
    LeadFPSNumber,
    Migration,
    Act,
    Section,
    DataEaseOMA,
    OrderMakingAuthority,
    TitleOfOrder,
    OMAReference,
    OMAContact,
    OMATelephone,
    OMAFormOfAddress,
    DataEaseObjectors,
    NumberOfObjectors,
    ConcurrentObjectors,
    ReceiptOfOrders,
    DocumentationComplete,
    AllocationLevel,
    FeeRate,
    DateOrderValidated,
    OrderRejectedOrReturned,
    DateOrdersWithdrawn,
    DateOfRecoveryBySOS,
    DateProcedureConfirmed,
    Procedure,
    DateInquiryRequested,
    LocalInquiryDate,
    EstimatedDuration,
    InquiryVenue,
    SentForAllocation,
    InspectorsName,
    InquiryObservedBy,
    InquirySVCancelled,
    ASVUSV,
    NumberOfClaims,
    GBPCommitted,
    CommittedLeft,
    ActualDuration,
    SittingDaysClaimed,
    PreparationTime,
    ReportingTime,
    CostOfClaims,
    DateFileToInspector,
    ReceiptOfDecisionReport,
    DateSentToReader,
    ReadersName,
    DateReturnedFromReader,
    DateDecisionReportDespatched,
    DecisionRecommendation,
    DatePublicationProcedureCompleted,
    DateFileToPA,
    AssociatedFile1,
    AssociatedFile2,
    AssociatedFile3,
    AssociatedFile4,
    AssociatedFile5,
    AssociatedFile6,
    AssociatedFile7,
    AssociatedFile8,
    AssociatedFile9,
    DateCostsReportDespatched,
    DateCostsOrderOriginated,
    Notes,
    OMAStance,
    LastSittingDay,
    RechargedToDefra,
    NameOfApplicant,
    DecisionClearForDespatch,
    PDACETLDate,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim AS Target
USING casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.LegacyRightsOfWayID = Target.LegacyRightsOfWayID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        LegacyRightsOfWayID,
        RecordStatus,
        RecordGroup,
        Jurisdiction,
        FPSNumber,
        FPS1,
        FPS2,
        FPS3,
        FPS4,
        LeadFPSNumber,
        Migration,
        Act,
        Section,
        DataEaseOMA,
        OrderMakingAuthority,
        TitleOfOrder,
        OMAReference,
        OMAContact,
        OMATelephone,
        OMAFormOfAddress,
        DataEaseObjectors,
        NumberOfObjectors,
        ConcurrentObjectors,
        ReceiptOfOrders,
        DocumentationComplete,
        AllocationLevel,
        FeeRate,
        DateOrderValidated,
        OrderRejectedOrReturned,
        DateOrdersWithdrawn,
        DateOfRecoveryBySOS,
        DateProcedureConfirmed,
        Procedure,
        DateInquiryRequested,
        LocalInquiryDate,
        EstimatedDuration,
        InquiryVenue,
        SentForAllocation,
        InspectorsName,
        InquiryObservedBy,
        InquirySVCancelled,
        ASVUSV,
        NumberOfClaims,
        GBPCommitted,
        CommittedLeft,
        ActualDuration,
        SittingDaysClaimed,
        PreparationTime,
        ReportingTime,
        CostOfClaims,
        DateFileToInspector,
        ReceiptOfDecisionReport,
        DateSentToReader,
        ReadersName,
        DateReturnedFromReader,
        DateDecisionReportDespatched,
        DecisionRecommendation,
        DatePublicationProcedureCompleted,
        DateFileToPA,
        AssociatedFile1,
        AssociatedFile2,
        AssociatedFile3,
        AssociatedFile4,
        AssociatedFile5,
        AssociatedFile6,
        AssociatedFile7,
        AssociatedFile8,
        AssociatedFile9,
        DateCostsReportDespatched,
        DateCostsOrderOriginated,
        Notes,
        OMAStance,
        LastSittingDay,
        RechargedToDefra,
        NameOfApplicant,
        DecisionClearForDespatch,
        PDACETLDate,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.LegacyRightsOfWayID,
        Source.RecordStatus,
        Source.RecordGroup,
        Source.Jurisdiction,
        Source.FPSNumber,
        Source.FPS1,
        Source.FPS2,
        Source.FPS3,
        Source.FPS4,
        Source.LeadFPSNumber,
        Source.Migration,
        Source.Act,
        Source.Section,
        Source.DataEaseOMA,
        Source.OrderMakingAuthority,
        Source.TitleOfOrder,
        Source.OMAReference,
        Source.OMAContact,
        Source.OMATelephone,
        Source.OMAFormOfAddress,
        Source.DataEaseObjectors,
        Source.NumberOfObjectors,
        Source.ConcurrentObjectors,

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LegacyRightsOfWayID NULLS LAST) AS LegacyRightsOfWayID,
    RecordStatus,
    RecordGroup,
    Jurisdiction,
    FPSNumber,
    FPS1,
    FPS2,
    FPS3,
    FPS4,
    LeadFPSNumber,

    ConcurrentObjectors,
    ReceiptOfOrders,
    DocumentationComplete,
    AllocationLevel,
    FeeRate,
    DateOrderValidated,
    OrderRejectedOrReturned,
    DateOrdersWithdrawn,
    DateOfRecoveryBySOS,
    DateProcedureConfirmed,
    Procedure,
    DateInquiryRequested,

    AssociatedFile1,
    AssociatedFile2,

    AssociatedFile4,
    AssociatedFile5,
    AssociatedFile6,
    AssociatedFile7,
    AssociatedFile8,
    AssociatedFile9,
    DateCostsReportDespatched,
